topics.body:
I've been thinking of making a tabletop game set in the world of Watch_Dogs, because it's got such _amazing_ possibilities that people don't see because they're too busy bitching about graphics and stuff like that.
The only problem that I have is that I _don't actually know how to set up a tabletop._

topics.body:
I bet Gasmask and Whatevs are going to have a orgasm about this, but apparently a updated model and poll on american's political ideology places turned up that more and more people are becoming anti-authoritarian.

Basically if you look at authoritarian-LeftVsRight political spectrum the average american is moving massively anti-authoritarian.


Essentially you know how every hundred years or so both parties wind up in deep shit and are so out of touch with the people that they get utterly metaphorically raped in elections?  Basically if a anti-authoritarian political group showed up they would receive a ungodly asskicking.
